adviseScripts.text: Cleaning is just the best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Nothing beats seeing the satisfaction on other peoples' faces once you've got a place spick and span,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: and you're always filled with a sense of pride once you're done cleaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Looks like you might have a lot on your plate. Do you want some help?
Looking forward to seeing you work your magic in the future.
Oh, I'm okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I know that you're rather busy yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'll be able to clean this place just fine on my own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for your concern, though! Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, you just wait and see!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: This place is gonna be immaculate.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica thoroughly cleans the dormitory.
Where is your favorite spot in Snowfield?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: The restaurant, because you can taste a wide variety of dishes there.
The breathtaking waterfall.
Wow, have you and Belorta been talking?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: She said the restaurant was her favorite as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: She loves the warmth from the ovens and the aromas that are produced during mealtimes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Whoa! Me too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I love the waterfall.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: The way the water comes crashing down, it's just so soothing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I watch it, it makes me feel reinvigorated somehow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I really like that, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about the places we like in Snowfield.
W-welcome to Snowfield Hot Spring!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: How was that greeting?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You need to have a bit more confidence.
I like the energy that you're bringing to it.
Okay...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Darn, I practiced so many times...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Was it really that easy to tell that I was nervous?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Wow, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's reassuring, because I've really been practicing hard on it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I read somewhere that
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: the initial greeting when you enter a place is very important.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'm still a bit nervous about it, though, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I help Mica practice her greeting and become more confident.
The hot spring is fantastic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It relaxes you, and all your fatigue just melts away.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Do you enjoy it as well, Old-Timer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It's the best. I try and go whenever I have the chance.
It's great, but the water is a tad too hot.
Wow, so you go as much as possible?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Oh my goodness, you're practically beaming right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You must really love it if just thinking about it makes you this happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Belorta has that same expression when she's eating a good meal, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Oh, you think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Well, I guess it's difficult to regulate the temperature of the hot spring separately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Just be careful not to get burned!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about the advantages of hot springs.
The hot springs at Snowfield feel different from the others you find on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: There's something special about them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What do you think that is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Because we get to be here with the people we love?
Maybe because this place is surrounded by snow?
Hey, you may be onto something!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Belorta and Ludmilla are here,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: and so are you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Hey, you're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You don't get to see snow very often in the Ark,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: so that must be why it feels extra special.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about why Snowfield Hot Spring feels particularly special.
Old-Timer, come look at this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I found a whole bunch today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I was really selective and only picked ones that looked really smooth. What do you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica opens her hands to reveal a small pile of stones of various shapes.
They all... look pretty similar to me.
They're so pretty. Like little gemstones.
What?! You really think that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: No, come on, if you look closely here, this one has a faint white hue to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: This one has stripes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: And here...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I thought the exact same thing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I picked them out super carefully, one by one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: If any particular one catches your eye, let me know and I can give it to you as a gift.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica carefully goes over the various features of her stone collection to me.
Old-Timer,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: do you think I look good in this outfit?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, it suits you.
Yeah, it goes well with the surroundings of Snowfield Hot Spring.
Thank you for the compliment, Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Hehe... I'm glad you feel that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Huh? I wasn't really talking about that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: ... Never mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about the clothes she is wearing.
Whenever I walk around Snowfield Hot Spring,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: sometimes it feels like I'm dreaming.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I never expected I'd get to see so much snow on the surface in my life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You mean you didn't know? This is all a dream.
Sometimes I feel that way too.
What?! Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: If this is a dream, I don't want to ever wake up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Wow, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So I'm not the only one who feels that way, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about the beautiful snow-covered scenery of Snowfield Hot Spring.
Mica is arranging various fireworks and appears to be deep in thought.
Belorta and I are having a fireworks display tonight,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: and I'm trying to figure out which fireworks to bring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Which one do you like, Old-Timer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... I like this heart-shaped firework.
Hmm... I like this star-shaped firework.
This one is Belorta's favorite,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: so I prepared plenty in advance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What about the others? Any that catches your eye?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Wow, no kidding!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's the one I like as well, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So I brought plenty of them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What about the others? Any that catches your eye?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Mica choosing between different types of fireworks.
Old-Timer,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: my body feels kinda funny.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I just ate something,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: but I wasn't able to taste anything!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Were you eating Emma's cooking?
What was it that you ate? Something unusual?
How did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, Emma was on cooking duty today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Not at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It was a perfectly normal dish.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Was it something that Emma had prepared?
Huh? Yeah, how did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I ate the very same thing earlier, and I wasn't able to taste anything either.
Mica and I have a conversation about Emma's strange and bewildering cooking.
Since coming to Snowfield Hot Spring, Belorta and I have received a lot of help from Ludmilla.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So I want to give her a gift as a token of my appreciation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What do you think would be a great gift?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you just ask her what she wants?
Why don't you discuss it with Belorta?
That's a good idea,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: but Belorta and I wanted to make it a surprise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: So asking her isn't really an option.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's a great idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Ludmilla is a big fan of tea,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: so Belorta and I will find out what type she likes in particular.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Thanks, Old-Timer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I think about what gifts to give Ludmilla.
The sleeves on this shirt are a bit long,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: which really hampers my cleaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Use a ribbon to secure Mica's sleeves.
Roll up Mica's sleeves.
How about this?
Nice!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I can move around all I want, and it doesn't go anywhere.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It's really comfortable, too. Thanks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: How about this?
Let's see... oops!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It came undone...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I think I need something that'll be able to secure it firmly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I teach Mica various ways to firmly secure her sleeves.
Old-Timer, do I look strange?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: What do you mean?
Well... to be honest...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I think I look kind of weird without applying camo cream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You're naturally cute, so any look you adopt is fine.
You look even cuter without applying camo cream.
Wow, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It makes me happy hearing you say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I just can't get used to not applying it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I can certainly try to, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I have a conversation about camo cream.
I got you a gift,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica hands over a small snowman.
Thank you. Did you make this yourself?
It's a bit warm in here. Are you sure it won't melt?
I sure did!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I used some of the stones I collected for the eyes and nose, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Oh no! I worked so hard on it. I don't want it to melt!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Should I take it back outside?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: To prevent it from melting, Mica places the snowman in a shady area outside.
Whenever I have a snowball fight with Belorta,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I always lose.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to win at least once...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Belorta always aims for the face, so it's hard to beat her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You should do what she does.
Try using some unique weaponry.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: But she's so fast...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: By the time I'm halfway through rolling up a snowball, she's already finished with hers.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I guess I'm out of options, though... I might as well try it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Like what?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I hand Mica her weapon.
A frying pan?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Ah, are you saying I should use this to cover my face?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: This will definitely work to block any incoming snowballs.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Thanks. I'll be sure to win next time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: A few hours later, Mica returns with a despondent face, indicating that victory is still a long way off.
When I went to the restaurant, they had rice balls, so I tried them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: They were delicious!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I was wondering if you'd made them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Or maybe it was Emma?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It definitely wasn't Emma.
I think it might have been Emma.
You don't think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I thought it had either been you or her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Guess it was neither of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I knew it was her!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: The only thing was... those rice balls were absolutely scrumptious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: The ones Emma used to make had chocolate in them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: On second thought, perhaps it wasn't Emma who made them.
Then who did?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I attempt to ascertain who made the delicious rice balls.
I'm always so happy whenever I'm with Blanc and Noir.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Why is that?
They're both so kind, and beautiful, and get along so well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, whenever you're with those two, it's a good time.
Honestly, I'm more happy when I'm spending time with you and Belorta.
Hmm?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Are you okay, Old-Timer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Your face is turning red.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I'm with you,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I feel way better! Hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about people that make us feel good.
I once got lost around here,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: and Ludmilla came to find me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: When I saw her appear on the horizon, she seemed like a true Snow Queen!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You must've been frightened losing your way. Try not to stray off too far in the future.
Ludmilla always has a regal air about her.
I guess cool people share certain similarities when it comes to this stuff,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: because Ludmilla said something similar to you, Old-Timer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: That's true,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: but it seemed particularly apparent that day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I dunno, it's hard to explain in words.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Mica about Ludmilla.
Old-Timer! I have a question!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer strong scents or something more subtle?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Subtle.
Strong.
Phew, I'm glad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I got some incense to help me sleep at night,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: and it happens to have a subtle aroma. Heh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: R-really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Why do you ask?
I got some incense to help me sleep at night,
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: but it has a subtle aroma.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: J-just a moment. If you wait, I'll go change...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It's okay, I'll use this. Thank you.
I spend time with Mica asking each other about the scents we like.
Let me show you something interesting!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: *Phoooooo*
Mica blows on a pile of snow in her hand, sending the flakes scattering into the air.
Pretty cool, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mmm, very interesting.
Where did you get that snow?
That response didn't sound very sincere...
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to pretend to be excited if you're not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It just started snowing a moment ago!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: I grabbed a handful of snow
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: so that I could show it to you, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: It was worth it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Mica

adviseScripts.text: Mica and I have a conversation about the mystery of snow.
